top.title: High-speed train collision in Spain kills at least 21
top.summary: More than 400 passengers were on board the trains that derailed near the city of Córdoba in Spain's worst rail crash in more than a decade.

top.title: US believes its power matters more than international law, UN chief tells BBC
top.summary: António Guterres says Washington's "clear conviction" is that multilateral solutions are irrelevant.

top.title: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
top.summary: Trump says he will impose new taxes on eight US allies in February if they oppose his proposed takeover of the autonomous Danish territory.

top.title: ChatGPT to carry adverts for some users
top.summary: OpenAI is also expanding its cheaper subscription tier, ChatGPT Go, to all countries where it operates.

top.title: Mother of Elon Musk's child sues xAI over Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The parent company of X and Grok, xAI, launched a counter-suit saying she had violated its terms of service.

top.title: Use film-style age ratings to limit teens' social media, say Lib Dems
top.summary: The Conservatives want to see ban of all under-16s from social media, but the Lib Dems say that would be a "blunt instrument".

title.#text: You need to listen to the cosmic horror-comedy podcast Welcome to Night Vale
